QuestData.Title: The Bear's Blessing
QuestData.Description: Before the bear's paw can be used to cleanse the afflicted, it must be completed and blessed. To the north of the village roams a tallstrider named Fleetfoot. You'll need its tailfeathers to complete the herb bundle.$B$BBring the tailfeathers and the bear's paw bundle to the ancient bear statue in the ruins around the Grove of the Ancient, further north of where you'll find Fleetfoot.$B$BWhile at the shrine, combine the tailfeathers with the bear's paw and receive the bear spirit's blessing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Elder Brolg at Blackwood Hold wants you to bring him the Blessed Herb Bundle.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you visited the old bear statue?
QuestData.RewardText: <Elder Brolg accepts the blessed bundle from you and looks over it.>$B$BThis is exactly what we needed. The bear's spirit favors us and there may be hope for my brothers after all.
